headline: Fragmented HCM systems jeopardize business efficiency, Paycom research reveals
summary: OKLAHOMA CITY, May 19, 2025--Paycom Software, Inc. (NYSE: PAYC) ("Paycom"), a leading provider of comprehensive, cloud-based human capital management software, discovered surveyed businesses rely on an average of 6.17 HCM providers to manage the employee life cycle, according to a Forrester Consulting study commissioned by Paycom. Respondents using multiple providers cited problems with data accuracy, which obstructs timely and effective workforce reporting.

headline: Paycom Jumps 26% in a Month: Is the Stock Still Worth Buying?
summary: PAYC shines with innovation, client wins and ROI-focused tools, setting the stage for sustained growth and margin expansion.
